settings.subtitle: From the revolutionary FlexVolt 54V system to the proven XR 18V range, DeWalt has been engineering professional power tools since 1923. Over 400 DeWalt products available at Invicta Tools.

settings.title: 100 Years of Job Site Innovation
settings.paragraph_1: Raymond DeWalt invented the radial arm saw in 1923, transforming the construction industry overnight. A century later, DeWalt — now part of Stanley Black & Decker — continues to push the boundaries of what professional power tools can do.
settings.paragraph_2: The XR 18V platform delivers brushless performance across hundreds of tools, while FlexVolt 54V bridges the gap between cordless convenience and corded power. Combined with the TSTAK modular storage system, DeWalt offers a complete job site solution.
settings.feature_1: Inventor of the radial arm saw

settings.title: Heavy Construction
settings.description: SDS-Plus and SDS-Max rotary hammers, demolition breakers, and diamond core drills. FlexVolt 54V delivers the power for the toughest structural work on site.

settings.title: Carpentry & Second Fix
settings.description: Precision mitre saws, plunge saws, planers, and routers. DeWalt's XR brushless motors deliver consistent cuts and smooth finishes all day long.

settings.title: Automotive & Mechanical
settings.description: High-torque impact wrenches, ratchets, and grinders. DeWalt's compact designs and extreme torque output make them the go-to choice for mechanics and fabricators.

settings.title: Electrical Installation
settings.description: Compact 12V MAX drill drivers, impact drivers, and oscillating multi-tools. Purpose-built for tight spaces and overhead work in domestic and commercial installations.

settings.title: Site Organisation
settings.description: TSTAK modular storage connects, stacks, and organises. Rolling chests, deep boxes, and organisers that clip together for easy transport. Keep your van and site tidy.

settings.title: Who Uses DeWalt?
settings.subtitle: From heavy construction to precision carpentry — DeWalt delivers on every job site

settings.title: FlexVolt 54V Range
settings.description: The game-changing FlexVolt battery automatically switches between 18V and 54V depending on the tool. One battery, two voltages. Use it in your existing XR 18V tools for extended runtime, or unlock 54V power in FlexVolt tools for corded-level performance.

settings.title: POWERSTACK™ Battery
settings.description: DeWalt's revolutionary pouch cell battery technology delivers 50% more power than standard lithium-ion packs. Lighter, more compact, and with better thermal management — POWERSTACK is the future of cordless power.

settings.title: DeWalt Innovation
settings.subtitle: Pushing the boundaries of cordless power tool technology

settings.title: Products In Stock
settings.description: Invicta Tools carries over 413 DeWalt products — from drill drivers to diamond blades. One of Kent's largest DeWalt stockists with fast dispatch and next-day delivery.

settings.title: FlexVolt Power
settings.description: The only cordless battery that automatically changes voltage. 54V in FlexVolt tools, 18V in XR tools. One battery investment, twice the versatility. No other brand offers this.

settings.title: Free Service
settings.description: Every DeWalt power tool comes with a 1-year free service guarantee. Take it to any authorised service centre for a free check-up and maintenance within the first year.

settings.title: Years of Heritage
settings.description: From the first radial arm saw in 1923 to today's brushless cordless revolution. A century of engineering power tools that professionals depend on every single day.

settings.title: Modular Storage
settings.description: The TSTAK system connects, stacks, and organises your tools and accessories. From deep tool boxes to rolling carts — everything clicks together for easy transport.

settings.title: Job Site Tough
settings.description: DeWalt XR tools are built to survive real job sites. Dust and water resistant housings, all-metal gearboxes, and rubber over-moulds for maximum durability and grip.

settings.title: Why Professionals Choose DeWalt
settings.subtitle: Job site tough tools backed by a century of engineering excellence

settings.title: Drills & Impact Drivers
settings.description: XR 18V combi drills, hammer drills, impact drivers, and SDS rotary hammers. Brushless motors for more power and longer life.

settings.title: Saws & Cutting
settings.description: Circular saws, mitre saws, table saws, jigsaws, and reciprocating saws. FlexVolt 54V for demanding cuts, XR 18V for everyday use.

settings.title: Storage & TSTAK
settings.description: TSTAK modular boxes, rolling tool chests, and organisers. Connect, stack, and transport your entire kit with one integrated system.

settings.title: Explore DeWalt Products
settings.subtitle: From cordless power tools to modular storage solutions

settings.title: DeWalt FlexVolt 54V Technology
settings.description: See how the FlexVolt battery automatically switches between 18V and 54V to deliver the right power for every tool. One battery system, unlimited possibilities.

settings.title: Need Help Choosing?
settings.subtitle: Our team knows DeWalt inside out. Call for expert advice on the right tool for your job.
